üìê Draw Your Project Boundary

Use the interactive map below to draw the boundary of your project area. Follow the step-by-step guide to ensure accurate measurements.

üìã Drawing Instructions

1
Locate Your Property

Search for your address or navigate to your property location on the map.

2
Select Drawing Tool

Click the polygon tool to start drawing your boundary.

3
Draw the Boundary

Click points around your project area. Double-click to finish the polygon.

4
Review & Confirm

Check the measurements and edit if needed before confirming.

üì± Mobile Drawing Tips
